0.name: Shard Sword
0.fullDesc: Deals <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to an enemy.

1.name: Forest of Swords
1.fullDesc: Consumes HP equal to {{1}}% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of his ATK and <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of Blade's ATK and <orangeStrong>{{5}}%</orangeStrong> of his Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.\nForest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.
1.shortDesc: Consumes HP and deals Wind DMG to an enemy, as well as minor Wind DMG to adjacent targets.

0.name: Hellscape
0.fullDesc:
Consumes HP equal to {{1}}% of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state.
When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong>, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for {{2}} turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.
0.shortDesc: Consumes HP to <color=#f29e38ff>Enhance Basic ATK</color>, and this turn does not end after this Skill is used.

0.name: Death Sentence
0.fullDesc: Sets Blade's current HP to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of his ATK, <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of his Max HP, and <orangeStrong>{{5}}%</orangeStrong> of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of his ATK, <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> of his Max HP, and <orangeStrong>{{6}}%</orangeStrong> of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.\nThe tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at {{7}}% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.
0.shortDesc: Sets current HP to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of Max HP, and deals massive Wind DMG to a single enemy and Wind DMG to adjacent targets.

0.name: Karma Wind
0.fullDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes {{2}}% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to {{1}}% of his Max HP to all enemies.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes own HP and deals Wind DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
